      F SurrogateSwap.swap(T o) 
      S PojoSwap.swap(T o)

      S PojoSwap.swap(T o, BeanContext beanContext)
      Same as PojoSwap.swap(Object), but override this method instead if you want access to the bean context that created this swap.
